tool_description: ProgicTech presents a comprehensive collection of innovative and highly effective tools meticulously curated to empower developers throughout the entire application development journey. Tailored to meet the diverse needs of modern app development, these tools form an integrated ecosystem designed to streamline workflows, boost productivity, and enhance the overall development experience.
name: ProgicTools
title: ProgicTools

api_list.name: Get User Config
api_list.description: get your profile user config based on your subscription account
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://progictools.p.rapidapi.com/user-config"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "progictools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /ping
api_list.description: An api that is use to welcome the first time user and also as act as single source of truth when required.
